meanings.sent1: She sang transcendentally, reaching notes no one thought possible.
meanings.sent2: The music played transcendentally, filling the room with a sense of peace.
meanings.sent3: The cat leaped transcendentally high to catch the elusive laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: His skills on the piano were transcendentally beautiful, like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky transcendentally, blending colors in a breathtaking display.

meanings.definition: Beyond or above the range of normal or merely physical human experience.
meanings.sent1: The mystical experience was transcendentally enlightening for the young monk.
meanings.sent2: The mountain peak offered a transcendentally stunning view of the valley below.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so delicious, it seemed transcendentally magical to the taste buds.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was transcendentally powerful, echoing through the concert hall.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins held a transcendentally mysterious aura, captivating all who visited.
